lead_paragraph: A strike for higher wages, which began May 22, has idled work at four other Honda assembly plants in China.
snippet: A strike for higher wages, which began May 22, has idled work at four other Honda assembly plants in China.

headline.main: Honda Plans to Raise Pay at a Factory in China
headline.seo: Honda to Raise Pay at Striking Plant in China
headline.print_headline: Honda Plans To Raise Pay At a Factory In China
